TopicTitle: Lookin' for Mortimer Kerman (Finances) - File Search

Articles.Content:
So I've had an idea for a KSP-based (ish) poster/animation recently, and for it to work I need a specific Kerbal model, of which I'm still searching for.

Mortimer Kerman is not an Astronaut, he is a Kerbal who appears in the Funding/Science building during Career Mode (basically, the building where you sacrifice Science points, funds or reputation to gain more). Mortimer appears above the "Finances" column.

(Now I come to think of it, he might not be called "Mortimer Kerman" in other Career saves, I don't know)

Anyway, I've been searching through the game's files to find his model. And this is the closest I've gotten;

~Steam/SteamApps/Common/Kerbal Space Program/GameData/Squad/Strategies

For those who haven't checked the file before, its filled with all the Strategy icons and four configs (two for "Departments" and two for the strategies), but no model.

In-fact, I've searched all the files practically thoroughly and haven't found any Kerbal Models (only models for Rocket parts).

So if anyone has the Model for the Finances Kerbal or knows where he is within KSP's GameData files, please let me know.

Thanks.

(=)<-<

-- Fred Cop --

Sorry but Squad doesn't make these available.

Closing.
